description: Anne-Elisabeth Hagen vanished in 2018 and is now presumed dead.
title: Norway tycoon Tom Hagen held over wife's disappearance
title_page: Norway tycoon Tom Hagen held over wife's disappearance - BBC News
maintext: Mr Hagen was picked up near the family home in Lorenskog, east of the capital Oslo. He was remanded in custody for four weeks, and has not yet been formally charged.
